episode_summary: In this episode, Joel Schaub discusses the importance of consistency and relationship-building in real estate, especially during challenging market cycles. He shares actionable tactics for engaging with clients on social media, leveraging technology like ChatGPT for market insights, and maintaining client relationships through personalized communication. The episode emphasizes the value of understanding both sides of a market argument to better serve clients.
